thesis: Fed rate cut expected but already priced in - market reaction depends on 2026 guidance and dot plot. Crypto weak on ETF outflows and extreme fear sentiment, while tech shows mixed signals with NVDA/MSFT still strong but facing valuation pressure. Week is defensive until Fed clarity emerges.

biases.reasoning: Strong Buy rating, Azure growth at 40%, $629 price target implies 28% upside. Most defensive mega-cap tech play with diversified revenue.
Strong fundamentals (46% analyst upside target) but 12% pullback on valuation concerns. Wait for post-Fed clarity before adding exposure.
Up 69% YTD, Gemini 3 AI momentum, most profitable tech company ($124.5B annual earnings). Q3 first time over $100B quarterly revenue.
Tech-heavy index facing rotation pressure as 10-year yields at 4.17%. Defensive stance until Fed provides 2026 clarity.
Trading at 6,840 near ATHs but waiting for Fed decision. Russell 2000 showing strength suggests potential rotation away from mega-caps.
